- Dec 30, 2020 Did God Make Harmful Parasites in the Beginning? - Dec 30, 2020 

 Frank Sherwin, D.Sc. (Hon.) - Parasites are a unique form of life in today’s world. These invertebrates come in all shapes and sizes, from single-cell animals (e.g., Plasmodium that causes malaria) to a tapeworm (Polygonoporus giganticus) that can grow up to 131 feet!...
